title: STEM Education Design Competency Enhancement Program for Students with Intellectual Disabilities

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Special Education Theories and General Education Experience
context.additional_context: Inquiry-based learning environments using digital devices, with peer coaching systems implementation.

learning_goals: Learners can explain principles for designing STEM activities tailored to the cognitive levels of students with intellectual disabilities
Learners can improve STEM lesson plans through three or more iterations incorporating peer coaching feedback
Learners can develop ten or more hands-on materials applying inquiry-based learning strategies
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
